## getTileAt() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Get the tile on top of the stack at the given coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getTileAt(board: GameBoard, coordinate: HexCoordinate): TileId | undefined;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

[TileId](./hive-lib.tileid.md) \| undefined

The tile on top of that stack at the given coordinate if there is one, otherwise undefined.
